special.description.bloodthirsty: Re-roll misses on first round of combat only.
special.description.brave: Shaken units rally on 4+ if more than 12'' from enemy.
special.description.crack: Re-roll one failed morale save if you have no casualties already.
special.description.determined-charge: Must charge where able to do so.
special.description.elite: Overcome disorder at start of Command on roll 4+.
special.description.ferocious-charge: Re-roll misses on combat following charge.
special.description.first-fire: +1 dice on fisrt shot of battle.
special.description.form-square: Can and must form a square when charged by cavalry.
special.description.freshly-raised: Random effectivness on first turn of shooting or hand-to-hand combat.
special.description.lancers: -1 morale against cavalry and -2 against infantry on charge.
special.description.steady: Passes first Break Test of the battle.
special.description.skirmishers: Can be deployed in skirmish order.
special.description.terrifying-charge: Charged enemy must take a Break Test.
special.description.unreliable: No move on equal command roll.
special.description.wavering: Take a Break Test when you take a casualty.
